content: A great many comments here criticize your anger. I am saddened by your post, but I will not criticize it. You are spot on when you criticize the many people who did not vote. Ms. Clinton should have won this election, and was prevented from winning by a perfect storm of factors, one of which was the failure of people to actually go out and vote. I have particular contempt for the Sanders voters who refused to heed Mr. Sanders himself and refused to vote for Ms. Clinton. Their refusal to support an imperfect candidate produced a despicable President.
